meanings.definition: A nutrient required by the body in small amounts for proper growth and development.
meanings.sent1: Eating a balanced diet rich in micronutrients is important for staying healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming micronutrients like vitamins and minerals for overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled my micronutrient powder all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, micronutrients are the tiny seeds that help us grow strong and vibrant.
meanings.sent5: The micronutrient content of this multivitamin supplement is carefully measured for optimal benefits.

meanings.definition: A substance that is essential for the normal functioning of the body but is only needed in very small quantities.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies rely on micronutrients like iron and zinc to function properly.
meanings.sent2: Micronutrients play a crucial role in maintaining our health despite being needed in tiny amounts.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the tiny sprinkle of micronutrient in my smoothie was like a secret ingredient for superpowers!
meanings.sent4: Just like a pinch of salt can transform a dish, micronutrients can have a powerful impact on our well-being.
meanings.sent5: The importance of micronutrients is often underestimated, but they are the unsung heroes of our daily nutrition.
